text.tspan: React is the extension library of JS
JSX => JS + XML => is JAVASCRIPT EXTENSION
JSX 內所有VARIABLE 變 了 VARIABLE EXPRESSION
props IS OBJECT, CAN ABSORB MULTIPLE ARGUMENTS
STATE VBARIABLE 專稱 如這個改, 成個component要重新render一次
control input => 加EVENTLISTENER EVENTHANDLER e.g onChange
uncontoled input => 最原始 no event control
CAN CAPTURE THE VALUE AFTER SUBMIT
簡化 ONCHANGE EVENT 程序
緊要DATA 可先監察才再出街
掛在指定VARIABLE上, 只要有變動, 就出現指定動作 (類似機關)
[e.target.name]: e.target.value //案發地點, 指住INPUT ELEMENT name field 的值
set Errors({...errors, email: validEmailRegex.test(value) ? "": "Email is not valid"})
